intro: Microchaete humilis, commonly known as the low hairgrass, is a small, herbaceous plant native to parts of Africa and the Middle East. It typically grows in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and rocky areas. The plant has slender,丛生 stems and produces tiny, spike-like inflorescences bearing small, wind-pollinated flowers.
